response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it's valued at $10,000 by us. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I believe we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I'm offering you the chance to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be extended to any other potential buyers.
